Title: Relates to enhanced penalties for domestic violence crimes
Summary: Provides that the commission of certain specified crimes which are committed against a member of the same family or household shall be punishable as domestic violence crimes and carry enhanced penalties.
LawCode: Add Title O Art 264 §§264.00 & 264.05, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to domestic violence crimes
